title: Entertainment round-up: Grimsby's Nobby rolls into town - BBC News
summary: grimsby and nobby roll into leicester square for world premiere .
all saints kick off comeback with new single .
justice league movie to begin filming in april .

documents.title: that 's all folks !
text: our time is up for the day , but there 's just enough room to squeeze in this of london 's odeon leicester square which has rebranded itself this week for the oscars .
no prizes for guessing who i 's supporting to win best actor this weekend with its new name - leodeon .
see what they did there ?
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: watch casey affleck and stephen colbert 's awkward interview
text: actor casey affleck had a tense exchange with us tv host stephen colbert on monday night .
affleck , promoting his latest film , crime thriller triple 9 , was teased when he sat down for not dressing up enough for the show .
colbert called him a `` street corner jesus '' and then joked their tensions would end up in a fist fight .
the tv host also admitted he had not managed to watch triple 9 because he was helping his son with a science project .
it ended on a slightly friendlier note just about .

documents.title: comedians go under the moon of love
text: this past weekend saw the annual leicester comedy festival .
a host of comics were in attendance and to celebrate the event they lip dubbed a video to the showaddywaddy classic , under the moon of love .
watch the clip below and look out for appearances from johnny vegas , romesh ranganathan , ed byrne and the last leg 's adam hills .

documents.title: madonna ruffles feathers in singapore
text: madonna is due to stop off in singapore this weekend as part of her rebel heart tour..
but while 55,000 fans are eagerly awaiting the queen of pop 's arrival - her first ever concert in singapore - the country 's roman catholic archbishop is n't as happy .

archbishop william goh has said he has met with government officials to express the church 's concerns over sunday 's concert and warned people against supporting those who `` denigrate and insult religions '' , citing madonna 's `` disrespectful use of catholic and other christian symbols '' .

the singer was banned from performing in largely conservative singapore in 1993 after police said her performances bordered on the obscene and were `` objectionable to many on moral and religious grounds '' .
but authorities have assured the archbishop restrictions are in place to ensure content deemed offensive would not be allowed on stage this time around .

over 18s are also only allowed to go to the gig , which local media has reported will not include a controversial section called holy water , featuring dancers dressed as scantily-clad nuns performing on cross-shaped stripper poles .

documents.title: charlie and chocolate factory 'to close ' in 2017
text: sam mendes 's stage version of charlie and the chocolate factory will close in london in 2017 .
the production has been at the theatre royal drury lane since june 2013 .
based on the roald dahl children 's book , it 's been seen by more than 1.8 million people during its london run .
it will tour around the uk in 2017 , while a broadway production will open in new york later this year .
the current closing date is 7 january 2017 , although a spokesperson told the bbc it may be booked for further performances in the west end before it ends its run .

documents.title: moneysupermarket advert 'most-complained about ' in 2015
text: one of the more memorable adverts of 2015 featured a man in heels strutting down a street while flaunting a rather pert posterior .

however the moneysupermarket ad was the most complained about of the year , attracting 1,513 complaints about its `` overtly sexual '' content , according to the advertising standards authority ( asa ) .
the asa said while some viewers might have found the advert `` distasteful '' , it was not judged to be offensive or in breach of the advertising code .
read the full story .

documents.title: mark ruffalo adds voice to oil well dispute
text: oscar nominee mark ruffalo has added his voice to a dispute over a controversial oil well in northern ireland .
the spotlight star , who is up for a best supporting actor oscar this sunday , has written to the authorities in support of protesters .
they are campaigning against an exploratory oil well at woodburn forest in county antrim .
ruffalo , who founded an organisation called water defense , had written to environment minister mark h durkan outlining his concerns .
the incredible hulk star said the `` small amount '' of oil and gas that might be found `` pales in comparison '' to the importance of protecting the water supply .

documents.title: james martin to leave saturday kitchen after 10 years
text: james martin is hanging up his apron and leaving saturday kitchen after presenting the bbc one show for 10 years .
the chef will host his final show at the end of march .
guest presenters will then front the cookery show from april onwards .
he said :
it has been an amazing journey and i have been privileged to work with some of the world 's greatest chefs and some of the greatest names in showbiz .
i wish the new chefs every success .
i am looking forward to getting stuck into my new projects and to lots of lie-ins on a saturday morning .
the show was initially fronted in 2002 by gregg wallace , who went on to masterchef , and then antony worrall thompson .
read more .

documents.title: commitments actor johnny murphy dies
text: johnny murphy , the actor who portrayed joey `` the lips '' fagan in the commitments , has died .
he is thought to have been in his early 70s .
glen hansard , who appeared alongside murphy in the film , paid tribute .
murphy 's commitments co-star maria doyle kennedy also paid her respects .
murphy found fame after playing fagan in the film version of the commitments , released in 1991 .
it tells the story of a working class boy in dublin called jimmy rabbitte who decides to form a soul band .
murphy 's character , the band 's trumpet player , memorably called his instrument gina , after gina lollobrigida .
the actor also starred in into the west , waiting for godot and angela 's ashes .
read more on this story .

documents.title: michael gambon 's surprise at playing winston churchill
text: sir michael gambon has revealed his `` shock '' at being cast as sir winston churchill in itv 's upcoming drama churchill 's secret .
he will portray the former prime minister 's final years in office as his health declined .
lindsay duncan will play his wife clementine and drama will be directed by charles sturridge , who was at the helm of itv 's hugely successful 1981 series brideshead revisited .
sir michael told radio times : `` it was a shock when the director said 'we want you to play churchill ' . ''
the actor added that sir winston and clementine had `` a profound relationship '' .
author: Radio Times

documents.title: dolph lundgren stars in kindergarten cop 2
text: in case you missed the memo , there 's a sequel to the arnold schwarzenegger classic and itv2 weekend staple kindergarten cop .
alas , arnie is not involved this time and instead has passed the baton on to fellow 80s action star dolph lundgren .
where can you see the film ?
on dvd of course when it 's released in may .
here 's the trailer .

documents.title: justice league movie to begin shooting in april
text: dc comics fans hold onto your hats - the long awaited justice league film is officially a goer .
zack snyder ( who has directed batman v superman : dawn of justice , will return to helm the superhero fest and is set to start filming on 11 april at warner bros leavesden studio in hertfordshire .
he spoke to entertainment weekly about why it 's taken the best part of a decade to get the film green-lit :
it was a little bit of an 'about time ' moment , and i do n't blame [ the studio ] for feeling that way , because it 's a long time coming .
but i do feel like it 's a little bit of a creative hurdle .
it seems like an easy thing to do at first glance , the idea that , 'oh , we just get the rest of the superheroes in there . '
but you have to [ establish ] a world where they can exist .
a previous justice league film was planned in 2007 , to be directed by mad max 's george miller , with many of the superheroes already cast .
the lone ranger 's armie hammer had signed on as batman , common was to be green lantern and the oc 's adam brody was the flash .
but the project collapsed due to the 2007-08 writers guild strike when the script was n't finished in time to begin filming .

the new justice league film will begin shooting two weeks after batman v superman is released , which focuses on the clash between superman and the caped crusader , who is fuming after the kryptonian wrecked half of metropolis in man of steel .
who would n't be ?
read the full story .
author: Entertainment Weekly

documents.title: michael ball to host this year 's olivier awards
text: michael ball is to host this year 's olivier awards .
the west end singer and presenter has previously won two oliviers - for best actor in a musical in 2008 for hairspray and in 2013 for sweeney todd .
the olivier awards , which are celebrating their 40th anniversary this year , will be held at london 's royal opera house on 3 april .
ball will also be hosting the nominations announcement , taking place at noon on 29 february .
the announcement will be streamed live at www.olivierawards.com .
voting has opened on tuesday for the magic radio audience award , the only olivier voted on by the public .

documents.title: katie hopkins tweets post-brain surgery
text: newspaper columnist and former apprentice contestant katie hopkins has sent out her first tweet after having brain surgery to try to cure her epilepsy .
she has had the condition since she was 19 , and it has caused her arms to dislocate 42 times in three years .

documents.title: rihanna unveils two videos for work
text: last night , rihanna and drake unveiled two back-to-back videos for their latest single , work .
within hours , the song had topped the billboard charts , giving rihanna her 14th us number one .
that means she 's had more number ones than michael jackson .
only the beatles , with 20 , and mariah carey , with 18 , have had more .
sadly , we ca n't embed such a risque video on the bbc .
but here are some screengrabs of the bits that wo n't get us into trouble .
there are n't many .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: is this the world 's worst choir ?
text: a woman who was told to stop singing when she was a child because she was spoiling it for everyone else , has set up a public choir .

documents.title: house of cards 's president underwood portrait unveiled
text: the smithsonian national portrait gallery in washington has many portraits of us presidents on display .
george washington and richard nixon are among those hanging in the america 's president 's section - and now there 's a new commander-in-chief joining them .
a 6ft portrait of kevin spacey 's fictional house of cards character , president francis j underwood , was unveiled at the gallery last night .
painted by british artist jonathan yeo , it was created to promote the fourth series of the netflix political drama .
yeo said his imposing portrait was intended to make the audience uncomfortable .
spacey added :
when it is hung at the right height you may wonder if i 'm about to kick you in the face , which seems appropriate for this particular character .

documents.title: eddie izzard starts his 27 marathons for sport relief
text: eddie izzard has begun the first of the 27 marathons he 's running for sport relief .
the comedian plans to run a marathon a day for the next 27 days - one for each year nelson mandela spent in prison .
`` the first 10 are always the hardest , but then your body and your brain gets used to it so it gets easier , '' he told the bbc .
izzard previously attempted a similar feat in south africa in 2012 , but had to pull out for health reasons .
he said :
what i 'm doing is not particularly special here , other people have done more crazy things .
the 54-year-old tweeted he began his marathon at 06:30 local time .
read more on this story .

documents.title: all saints kick off their comeback
text: pop group all saints revealed their first single in 10 years on chris evans 's bbc radio 2 breakfast show this morning .

written by singer shaznay lewis and pete hutchings ( ed harcourt , kylie minogue , lady gaga ) one strike is a laid-back pop song , with sun-kissed harmonies that instantly recall the band 's pure shores heyday .
you can hear it below .
all saints will be popping into radio 2 on friday to play their new single live .
fancy that .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: hewson and watkins among are you being served ? cast
text: bafta-award winning jason watkins ( the lost honour of christopher jefferies ) is to play mr humphries in the new version of are you being served ?
he is taking on the role originally played by john inman , while sherrie hewson ( benidorm , coronation street ) will play mrs slocombe .
this double-entendre laden role was originally played by mollie sugden , who regularly sported rainbow-coloured rinses in her hair .
the classic bbc sitcom about the staff of grace brothers store is returning after more than 30 years for a one-off special .
it will up where the old show left off .

other cast members include john challis ( only fools and horses ) as captain peacock , roy barraclough ( coronation street ) as mr grainger ; arthur smith ( comedian and writer ) as mr harmon and niky wardley ( the catherine tate show ) will play miss brahms .
what do you think of the casting ?
will the show , written by derren litten ( benidorm , the catherine tate show ) live up to the original ?
let us know .
you can tweet us @ bbcnewsents or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk

documents.title: indiana jones cinematographer douglas slocombe dies at 103
text: british cinematographer douglas slocombe , who shot 80 films including three indiana jones instalments , has died at the age of 103 .
he also worked on a number of ealing comedies such as the lavender hill mob and kind hearts and coronets , as well as the italian job and jesus christ superstar .
indiana jones director steven spielberg paid tribute to bafta-winning slocombe , calling him `` a great collaborator and a beautiful human being '' .
he said :
dougie slocombe was facile , enthusiastic , and loved the action of filmmaking .
harrison ford was indiana jones in front of the camera , but with his whip-smart crew , dougie was my behind-the-scenes hero for the first three indy movies .
read more on this story .

documents.title: dr luke denies kesha rape claims
text: the music producer accused by kesha of sexual assault has broken his silence by posting a string of tweets about the case .
in them dr luke , whose real name is luckas gottwald , denies raping the singer or having sex with her .
the allegations date back to 2005 when she was 18 , soon after she signed with him .
he has never been charged .
until now he has n't commented on the case but on monday night decided to have his say .
across 24 tweets he said kesha had been `` like a sister '' to him and that lawsuits `` should be resolved in court not here on twitter '' .
singer , songwriter and rapper kesha has argued she does n't want to record any new music with dr luke 's label , which is owned by sony music .
the tik tok singer wants to work in a different division of sony .
taylor swift has lent her support to kesha , donating $ 250,000 ( £ 176,000 ) to help her pay for legal fees against her former producer .
read more on this story .

documents.title: grimsby 's nobby rolls into town
text: sacha baron cohen arrived at the world premiere of his latest film , grimsby , dressed as the character he plays .
the star turned up in a van suitably dressed for a red carpet event in his dressing gown and slippers .
baron cohen stars as nobby , a football hooligan from grimsby , who 's reunited with his long-lost secret agent brother ( mark strong ) and forced to team up on an assignment .
if you believe everything you see in the movies , every secret agent has a line up of ladies on their arm - and nobby was no exception .
baron cohen 's wife , actress isla fisher , also attended the premiere , but in much more red carpet-appropriate attire .
read more on this story .

documents.title: get involved
text: remember you can keep in touch with us throughout the day and let us know your thoughts on the stories we 're covering .
you can tweet @ bbcnewsents or email entertainment.news @ bbc.co.uk .
author: Helen Bushby
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: hello tuesday !
welcome to another jam-packed day of entertainment news updates .
coming up we 'll bring you from last night 's grimsby premiere , news of eddie izzard 's marathon of marathons and madonna ruffling feathers in singapore .
if you missed the news headline yesterday , check out monday 's live page .
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter
